abstract: What seemed like a petty dust up between SAP and Oracle may turn out to be a bigger fight now that the Justice Department is getting involved.
snippet: What seemed like a petty dust up between SAP and Oracle may turn out to be a bigger fight now that the Justice Department is getting involved.
lead_paragraph: When Oracle sued SAP in March, claiming the big German software maker was guilty of “corporate theft on a grand scale,” it seemed mainly an amusing entertainment in the staid halls of enterprise software.

headline.main: Oracle Suit: More than a Stunt?
